abstract: Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries received $17.9 million for publicity rights to their August wedding. Today, 72 days later, they divorced. That comes to $10,358.80 per hour.
snippet: Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries received $17.9 million for publicity rights to their August wedding. Today, 72 days later, they divorced. That comes to $10,358.80 per hour.
lead_paragraph: There are lots of reasons why marriage can be a good financial investment, including that marriage correlates with higher lifetime earnings. But of course for one (soon to be former) celebrity couple -- Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries -- the payoff is much quicker, without that whole till-death-do-we-part commitment.
